attributes.action: MP’s must vote in accordance with their constituents on leaving the EU.
attributes.background:
The May deal is not perfect, it’s a compromise, but it does get us out, from there we can grow in an outward facing, fast paced global world.

The EU is looking like an Old Club, massive overheads, inward looking and spending all its time creating layer upon layer of regulations.

rejection.details:
How an MP votes would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.

You could ask your own MP to vote according to the result of referendum in your constituency. You can find out who your MP is and how to contact them here: 

https://www.parliament.uk/mps-lords-and-offices/mps/
